Question
========
Which of the following expressions generates the integer vector `r 1:5`?

Answerlist
----------
* `1:5`
* `seq(1, 5)`
* `seq(1, 5, 1)`
* `rep(1:5, 1)`
* `seq(0, 4, 1) + 1`
* `seq(1, 5, 5)`
* `rep(1, 5)`
* `rep(1, 5, 1)`
* `rep(1, 5, 5)`
* `seq(0, 4, 1) - 1`

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct.
* Correct.
* Correct.
* Correct.
* Correct.
* Wrong. This command will return a length-one vector containing only 1.
* Wrong. This command will return a sequence of five 1s.
* Wrong. This command will return a length-one vector containing only 1.
* Wrong. This command will return a length-25 vector that repeats the integers from 1 to 5 five times.
* Wrong. This command will return a length-five vector containing the integers from -1 to 3.
